doctor.name: Dr. Taposh Bose
doctor.info: Dr. Taposh Bose is a Chest Specialist in Rangpur. His qualification is MBBS, MCPS (Medicine), MD (Chest Disease), FCCP (USA). He is a Assistant Professor & Head, Respiratory Medicine at Rangpur Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Update Diagnostic, Rangpur. Practicing hour of Dr. Taposh Bose at Update Diagnostic, Rangpur is 4pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).

chamber.address: Dhap (Opposite to Police Fari), Jail Road, Rangpur
